SEARCH
Module overrungl.opengl
Package overrungl.opengl.ext.amd

Class GLAMDDebugOutput

java.lang.Object
overrungl.opengl.ext.amd.GLAMDDebugOutput
public final class GLAMDDebugOutput extends Object
GLAMDDebugOutput relies on preview features of the Java platform:
  • GLAMDDebugOutput refers to one or more preview APIs: Arena, MemorySegment, SegmentAllocator.
Programs can only use GLAMDDebugOutput when preview features are enabled.
Preview features may be removed in a future release, or upgraded to permanent features of the Java platform.
GL_AMD_debug_output
Since:
0.1.0
Author:
squid233
